description: Log_b 3 where b is smallest primitive root (A001918) mod n-th prime.
references: T. M. Apostol, Introduction to Analytic Number Theory, Springer-Verlag, Table 10.2, pp. 216-217.
crossrefs: Cf. table in A054503. Also A054505-A054513.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 09 2000
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Apr 09 2000
